<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
h = url
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
// ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç å‹¿åŠ¨ï¼
function atob(input) {
/*æ­£æ–‡è§£å¯†by: Yoloã€‚å†™æºè§£å¯†jsä¸æ˜“ï¼Œç¦æ­¢è½¬è½½ï¼*/
  const chars = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/='; 
  let str = String(input).replace(/=+$/, '');
  let output = '';  
  for (let bc = 0, bs = 0, buffer, i = 0; buffer = str.charAt(i++); ~buffer && (bs = bc % 4 ? bs * 64 + buffer : buffer, bc++ % 4) ? output += String.fromCharCode(255 & bs >> (-2 * bc & 6)) : 0) {
    buffer = chars.indexOf(buffer);
  }
  return output;
}

function decodeStr(arr) {
    let result = '';
    for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
        result += String.fromCharCode(arr[i]);
    }
    return decodeURIComponent(escape(result));
}

function decode(s, k) {
    let K = Array.from(k).map(a => a.charCodeAt(0));
    let S = atob(s).split('').map(a => a.charCodeAt(0));
    let g = S.map((h, i) => h ^ K[i % K.length]);
    return decodeStr(g);
}

let c = src.match(/await _.+\(\'([^']+)\','([^']+)'\)/);
let result = String(java.getString('#chaptercontent@html')).replace(/æœ¬ç« èŠ‚éƒ¨åˆ†å†…å®¹åŠ è½½é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·æ­£å¸¸æµè§ˆï¼Œé‡æ–°è½½å…¥æˆ–åˆ·æ–°å½“å‰ç½‘é¡µ[\s\S]*/g,'') + decode(c[1], c[2])
let reg = /[^a-zA-Z0-9\u4e00-\u9fa5\s\.,:;?!'"()-<>ã€ã€‚ï¼Œï¼›ï¼šâ€œâ€â€˜â€™ï¼ˆï¼‰ã€ã€‘ã€Šã€‹"]/g
result = result.replace(reg, '')
</js>

header:
<js>
(()=>{
	var ua = "navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase(); 			return { 				'mobile': !!(ua.match(/applewebkit.*mobile.*/) || ua.match(/iemobile/) || ua.match(/windows phone/) || ua.match(/android/) || ua.match(/iphone/) || ua.match(/ipad/)), 				'weixin': ua.indexOf('micromessenger') > -1 			};";
	var heders = {"User-Agent": ua};
	return JSON.stringify(heders);
})()
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let list = [];
let $ = JSON.parse(result);
let aid = $.info.articleid;
$.list.forEach((c) => {
  let text = c.chaptername;
  let xid = Math.floor(aid/1000);
  let href = `${source.key}/files/article/html555/${xid}/${aid}/${c.chapterid}.txt`; 
  list.push({text:text, href:href});
})
list
</js>

<js>
base = source.getKey();
lis = java.getElements('#newlist dd a');
var list = [];

for (var i = 0; i < lis.length; i++) {
     var href = lis[i].attr('href');
     var text = lis[i].text();
     if (/javascript/.test(href)) {
        if ( i < lis.length - 1 ) {
            var url = "https://www.baidu.com" + lis[i + 1].attr('href');         
        } else {
            var url = "https://cn.bing.com" + lis[i - 1].attr('href');
        }
     } else { var url = base + href; }
     // java.log(lis[i].text()+":"+url);
     list.push({"text": text, "href": url});
}

list
</js>
